transcript:
so how do you heal a broken heart easy
you don't the same way that you don't
heal a wound or a cut that is on your
skin you can't necessarily heal a broken
heart what heals the skin time what
heals a broken heart time if you sit
there and you're like heal heal heal and
you get mad at your cut for not healing
it's not going to heal any quicker in
fact it'll probably take longer because
of the bad energy going through you and
the stress you're putting your body
through the same way that with your
broken heart you can't rush it you have
grief sometimes you need to go through
the grieving process you have changes
that you need to make in yourself ways
that you view yourself in ways that you
viewed the relationship sometimes things
just take time and by trying to rush the
process actually a lot of times delays
the process
